sentences.english: The grim beadle now made a gesture with his staff.
sentences.chinese: 獄吏此時用權杖做了個姿勢。

sentences.english: The other members of his gang bribed a warder to spring him from jail.
sentences.chinese: 他那夥裏的其他成員收賣了獄吏，以解除對他的監禁。

sentences.english: There was no point in having a permanent enemy among the warders .
sentences.chinese: 在獄吏中樹敵是毫無道理的。

sentences.english: And there is Master Brackett, the old jailer, nodding and smiling at me.
sentences.chinese: 那位老獄吏布萊基特先生，還在那兒朝我點頭微笑呢。

sentences.english: The jailer connived at the escape from prison.
